nl.renarj.jasdb.core

Interface IndexableItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmbeddedEntity, SimpleEntity

    public interface IndexableItem

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getValue(String propertyName)
      Gets the first value of the property, in case of multivalue picks the first value in the collection.
      <T> List<T> getValues(String propertyName)
      Gets a collection of objects representing the values of a given property
      boolean hasValue(String propertyName)
      Returns whether a property has a value
      boolean isMultiValue(String propertyName)
      Returns wether a property is multivalue or not

    • Method Detail

      • hasValue

        boolean hasValue(String propertyName)
        Returns whether a property has a value
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The name of the property to check for a value
        Returns:
        True if the property has a value, False if not

      • getValue

        <T> T getValue(String propertyName)
        Gets the first value of the property, in case of multivalue picks the first value in the collection.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The name of the property to retrieve the value for
        Returns:
        The first value for the given property

      • getValues

        <T> List<T> getValues(String propertyName)
        Gets a collection of objects representing the values of a given property
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The name of the property to get the values for
        Returns:
        The collection of property values

        Returns wether a property is multivalue or not
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the property is multivalue, False if not
